ARABIC: وَخَلَقَ ٱلْجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and He created the jinn from a fusion of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And created jinns from the white-hot flame of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and has created the jinn from the flame of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and jinn from the many colored flames of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And created jinn from the flame of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the Jinn He created from a smokeless flame of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And He created the jinn of a flame of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and He created the jinn of a smokeless fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the jinn did He create of smokeless fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and He created the jinns from a flame of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And He created the Jinn of a flame of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and created the jinn out of a flame of a fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And He created Jinns from fire free of smoke:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the jinns did He create from a smokeless flame of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and He created the jinn from smokeless fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And created the jinn from a fusion of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:15] and He created the Jann, the father of the jinn, namely, Iblīs, of a smokeless flame of fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 633 (And the jinn) the father of the jinn and satans (did He create of smokeless fire.
